class.name: ru.fess38.finance.model.Transaction
class.sql-delete: update Transaction set isDeleted = TRUE where id = :id

hibernate-mapping.query: from Transaction where YEAR(dayRef) = :year and MONTH(dayRef) = :month and isDeleted = FALSE
hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT rubricId id, isDeleted FROM Transaction UNION ALL SELECT accountFromId, isDeleted FROM Transaction UNION ALL SELECT accountToId, isDeleted FROM Transaction UNION ALL SELECT userId, isDeleted FROM Transaction UNION ALL SELECT transactionGroupId, isDeleted FROM Transaction UNION ALL SELECT currencyId, isDeleted FROM Account ) t WHERE t.id = :id and t.isDeleted = FALSE
